II . To estimate rate immune reconstitution , engraftment , donor chimerism result combine preparative regimen . III . To determine rate disease relapse , acute graft-versus-host disease ( GVHD ) , day 100 disease-free survival patient receive 131 I-BC8 antibody ( Ab ) combine CY , FLU , 2 Gy TBI , tacrolimus , MMF , human leukocyte antigen ( HLA ) -haploidentical allogeneic hematopoietic cell transplant ( HCT ) . OUTLINE : This dose-escalation study iodine I 131 monoclonal antibody BC8 . RADIOIMMUNOTHERAPY : Patients receive therapeutic iodine I 131 monoclonal antibody BC8 via central line day -14 . NONMYELOABLATIVE CONDITIONING : Patients receive FLU intravenously ( IV ) 30 minute day -6 -2 CY IV 1 hour day -6 -5 . Patients undergo TBI day -1 . TRANSPLANTATION : Patients undergo allogeneic bone marrow transplantation day 0 . POST-TRANSPLATATION IMMUNOSUPPRESSION : Patients receive CY IV 1-2 hour day 3 , MMF IV orally ( PO ) thrice daily ( TID ) day 4 35 , tacrolimus IV 1-2 hour PO day 4 180 taper day 84 .
